author: Jeremy
content:
I will Keith to explain as he might be very busy and swamped at the moment, with other things.

Basically, your IC number, mobile number, your real full name, billing address where you register your phone address as, IMSI (which is the unique number associated with you on your cellular network which identifies you!), IMEI (which is the unique number associated with your device which identifies your specific device), and your SIM number (which is your specific unique SIM number), has all been breached and leaked and is being sold. So, itâ€™s everything about you and your mobile.
